annotations.pure_cap: fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk. microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute. add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug. add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug. add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug. mix the contents of the mug. heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve.
